snippet: After losing, 4-3, in overtime to the veteran Martin Brodeur and the Devils last Saturday, the Rangers have been befuddled by a series of inexperienced backup goalies.
abstract: New York Rangers, experiencing difficulty in their nine-game homestand, have been foiled by a series of inexperienced backup goalies on opposing teams.
lead_paragraph: After losing, 4-3, in overtime to the veteran Martin Brodeur and the Devils last Saturday, the Rangers have been befuddled by a series of inexperienced backup goalies.

headline.main: To Beat Rangers, Little Experience Is Necessary
headline.print_headline: To Beat Rangers, Little Experience Is Necessary
